intro: Triplophyllum glabrum, commonly known as the smooth triplophyllum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in clusters, which are typically pollinated by insects. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded or semi-shaded environments. Due to its ornamental value and medicinal properties, it is occasionally cultivated in horticultural settings.
